data.text: @MichaelApstein Taste and smell fine. Feeling much better overall.

@john_lichfield Sorry to hear you have been infected, hope you are feeling much better....your bulletins have contributed heavily to our decisions about how to negotiate our lives through this and so far we have escaped infection. Truly appreciate your reporting xx

@john_lichfield Regarding Covid, we’re likely in good shape through the summer. Perhaps similar to other respiratory viruses this too will become seasonal. October/November 2022 should tell—and not just about U.S. elections.
@john_lichfield Thank you for your weekly updates. Hope you didn’t lose your sense of smell or taste. Or if you did, it returns quickly.
@john_lichfield Sorry to hear you caught Covid, John. I hope you’re fully recovered.
@katrina1666 @john_lichfield It certainly makes a big difference. Everyone in France is masked; in places you can unmask (like restaurants) everyone is vaxxed. Neither true in U.K.
@john_lichfield COVID here in our tiny village in the Aude . We know of 10 cases including us . Possible asymptomatic carrier with positive daughter who works at the local bar
